entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or ice pellets ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 30%
